itineraries.title: Arrival & Orientation
itineraries.description: Arrive in Rome by train or flight. Check into a boutique hotel housed in a historic palazzo near the city center. Evening welcome dinner in a traditional trattoria in the Monti neighborhood.

itineraries.title: Ancient Rome Immersion
itineraries.description: Morning guided walking tour of the Roman Forum and Palatine Hill. Lunch in a local osteria. Afternoon free time to explore Piazza Venezia or the nearby markets. Evening visit to a small museum focusing on early Roman history.

itineraries.title: Arrival in Cairo & Check-In
itineraries.description: Arrive in Cairo and settle into a boutique hotel in the historic downtown area. Evening dinner featuring traditional Egyptian cuisine in a restored historic building.

itineraries.title: The Great Pyramids & Sphinx
itineraries.description: Full-day guided tour of the Giza Plateau, including the Great Pyramids and Sphinx. Lunch with a view of the pyramids. Free afternoon for personal exploration or a camel ride around the site.
